b.i: 2. The API Gateway forwards the request

switch.text: 2. The API Gateway forwards the request...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 110px; margin-left: 191px;

b.i:
value present in the request headers
and returns a policy statement

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 210px; margin-left: 561px;

b.i:
4.1 The request made by the user
has the valid header
so the call can access the AWS resources

switch.text: 4.1 The request made by the user...

b.i:
4.2 Access denied, the header is not present
or is invalid

switch.text: 4.2 Access denied, the header is not present...
